sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_nb_action.GeneratorTypeInputService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GeneratorTypeInputService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GeneratorTypeInputService = Class.create();

GeneratorTypeInputService.getBySysId = function(typeSysId) {
    var typeInputs = [];
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sn_nb_action_generator_type_input");
    gr.addQuery(Constants.COL_MODEL, typeSysId);
    gr.query();

    while (gr.next()) {
        typeInputs.push(new GeneratorTypeInputService(gr).getName());
    }
    return typeInputs;
};

GeneratorTypeInputService.prototype = {
    tableName: "sn_nb_action_generator_type_input",

    initialize: function(grOrSysId) {
        if (grOrSysId && grOrSysId.sys_class_name) {
            this.currentRecord = grOrSysId;
        } else if (grOrSysId) {
            var gr = new GlideRecord(this.tableName);
            if (gr.get(grOrSysId)) {
                this.currentRecord = gr;
            }
        }
    },

    getName: function() {
        return this.currentRecord.getValue(Constants.COL_ELEMENT);
    },

    type: 'GeneratorTypeInputService'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-12 20:53:44</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ae2bcb27c713011020dab6c427c260f3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GeneratorTypeInputService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Recommended Actions" source="sn_nb_action">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Recommended Actions">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ae2bcb27c713011020dab6c427c260f3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-26 02:07:55</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
